templates.title: Problem-Solution B2B Template
templates.body:
Hi {name},

I noticed {company} is in {industry}. Many {role}s I work with struggle with {pain_point}.

{product} helps solve this by {value_prop}.

Would you be open to a brief conversation this week?

Best,
{your_name}

templates.title: Value-First Template
templates.body:
Hi {name},

{product} has helped {similar_companies} achieve {key_metric}.

I'd love to show you how it could work for {company}.

Are you available for a 15-minute demo?

Best regards,
{your_name}

templates.title: Social Proof Template
templates.body:
Hi {name},

{similar_company} (similar to {company}) recently used {product} to {achievement}.

I thought you might find this relevant.

Would you like to see the full case study?

Best,
{your_name}

templates.title: Question-Based Opener
templates.body:
Hi {name},

Quick question: How is {company} handling {challenge} in {industry}?

Many {role}s are finding that {solution_approach} helps significantly.

I'd be happy to share what we're seeing in the market.

Interested in a quick chat?

Best,
{your_name}

templates.title: Direct Value Proposition
templates.body:
Hi {name},

{product} typically helps {role}s in {industry} reduce {cost_type} by {percentage}.

Given {company}'s scale, this could translate to {specific_benefit}.

Would a 15-minute conversation make sense?

Best regards,
{your_name}

templates.title: Insight Sharing
templates.body:
Hi {name},

I recently analyzed {industry} trends and noticed {insight}.

This might be relevant for {company}, especially given {context}.

I'd be happy to share the full analysis and discuss how it applies to your situation.

Interested?

Best,
{your_name}
